TopicTitle: Clivman's Tweakscale Replicas- 2 New Packs added July 25th!

Articles.Content:
My goal is to make replicas of all current, future, and historical rockets and spacecraft that have lower part count and higher detail than stock will allow, as many people can not run the crafts that are good stock replicas.

I will be using only Tweakscale(for correct sizes) and KJR(Struts otherwise can easily make up 50% of part count that could better be used elsewhere).

I also highly recommend Stock clamshell fairings for better looking rockets along with Stock plus to control the number of fairing sections.

All rockets are intended to be about 55% scale.

For images go two posts down.

All packs listed as "WIP" are completed but not uploaded yet.

NASA Packs

EELV Pack

Delta IV Variants, Atlas V in 501,401, and 541 variants, Falcon 9 V1.1 and Heavy, Delta II and its derivative-Delta III.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/231758-evolved-expendable-launch-vehicles

All are subassemblies

NASA Manned Space Program Pack

Mercury-Redstone, Mercury-Atlas, Gemini-Titan, Gemini- Agena Target Vehicle, Saturn 1B with CSM and Adapter for ASTP,

Saturn 5 with CSM and LM(only 173 Parts!), Saturn 5 with Skylab space station.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/232301-nasa-manned-space-program-replicas

CCDev and CRS Pack

Dragon V2(on Falcon 9 V1.1), Dream Chaser(on Atlas V), and CST-100(also on Atlas V) crewed spacecraft.

Dragon(on Falcon 9 V1.1) and Cygnus(on Antares) resupply ships.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/232322-commercial-crew-and-resupply

Orbital ATK Pack

Minotaur 1, 4, and 5, Taurus, Antares, and Pegasus XL with carrier aircraft(L-1011).

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/232324-orbital-atk-replicas

Light American Rockets Pack

SpaceX Falcon 1, Lockheed Martin Athena 1 and Athena 2, Scout and Vanguard small launch vehicles.

WIP

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/232325-light-american-rockets

Constellation Pack

Ares 1 and Ares V Launch Vehicles. Orion also included as craft.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/232328-constellation-pack

SLS Pack

SLS Block 1(3.75m), SLS Block 2(3.75m) Launch Vehicles. Orion and ARM also included as craft.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/232459-sls-replicas

Blue Origin Pack

Includes Blue Origin orbital and suborbital space tourism vehicles.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/232457-blue-origin-replicas

Commercial Stations Pack

Includes modules for the Exploration Gateway Platform and many different Bigelow Aerospace Stations.

WIP

Atlas Evolution Pack

Includes 1.875m Atlas rockets from the Atlas A to the Atlas 3.

They either have working stage and a half engines or an RD-180.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/233161-atlas-family-replicas

Delta Evolution Pack

Includes 1.875m Delta rockets from the Thor Missile to the Delta M.

Includes all the predecessors of the Delta 7000 and including the earlier Thor rocket family.

WIP

Titan Evolution Pack

Includes 1.875m Titan rockets from the Titan 1 ICBM to the Titan IV.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/233158-titan-family-replicas

JAXA Pack

H2A, H2B, and Epsilon Launch Vehicles. H2 Transfer Vehicle also included as craft.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/231759-jaxa-replicas

ESA Pack

Ariane 5, Vega Launch Vehicles. Automated Transfer Vehicle and Columbus Man-Tended Free Flyer space station also included as craft.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/231762-esa-pack

Roscosmos Pack

Proton, Dnepr, Angara, Zenit, Rockot, R7, and N-1 Launch Vehicles. Zond, N1-L3, Vostok, Soyuz, PPTS, Progress, OPSEK space station and Orbital technologies space station also included as craft.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/231815-roscosmos-pack

ISRO Pack

GSLV Mk 2 GSLV Mk 3, PSLV Launch Vehicles. ISRO orbital vehicle also included as craft.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/231825-isro-pack

CNSA Pack

Long March 2(2.5m), Long March 3(2.5m), Long March 5 340(2.5m), Long March 5 522(3.75m), Long March 6(1.875m) Launch Vehicles. Shenzhou, Tiangong-Derived Robotic Resupply Vehicle , Tiangong 1, 2, and 3 space stations also included as craft.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/shareables/231852-cnsa-pack

Plans

1.Remaining Small Russian ICBM derived Rockets(Start-1, Shi'tl, Volna, Kosmos, Tsyklon)

2. Mu-5, N-1, N-2, H-2.

3. Ariane 1,2,3,4, and 6, Europa, and Diamant.

4. Juno-2

5. Hermes Shuttle

6. STS.

7. SLV

8. Earlier Chinese and Japanese Rockets.

9. Fuji Capsule

10. Mir, Salyut

Edited July 26, 2015 by clivman

Using Post for Pictures

Thanks- do you mind if I use your idea for the upper part of the CCB texture?

Which idea? I'd like to know which one you're talking about

Also, never seen a Vega replica in quite a while!

Which idea? I'd like to know which one you're talking about

Clipping a small grey fuel tank over two big orange ones to make a small red fuel tank. Like this

I did my Long March Line a while ago but you gave me the idea to use it on the Delta IV

Also, never seen a Vega replica in quite a while!

I still need to clean it up a little bit, but I just released a patch to fix it in case any of you were experiencing a launch pad bug.
Also, do you guys want me to focus on ARM with SLS or Constellation moon landing?
I just uploaded a new 2.7 m Delta IV Heavy

Clipping a small grey fuel tank over two big orange ones to make a small red fuel tank. Like this

http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/30745266808115414/89CA4566A0DED16E6FFC3D6E965D4EB6041FF38D/

I did my Long March Line a while ago but you gave me the idea to use it on the Delta IV

I still need to clean it up a little bit, but I just released a patch to fix it in case any of you were experiencing a launch pad bug.

Mmm, sure, thanks for asking

Good luck!
